sections.heading: Licensing of mortgage bankers required; qualifications; application; bond; fees; renewal6-943
sections.text: Licensing of mortgage bankers required; qualifications; application; bond; fees; renewalA. A person shall not act as a mortgage banker if the person is not licensed under this article.B. The deputy director
